EmailTemplate.name: Courtesy Intro Follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Account # {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - Courtesy Intro Follow-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for the time today and welcoming my call...
As I mentioned, our team oversee's the Purchasing Account with Office Depot. If you ever have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to call me. I am here to assist you with anything you may need and I look forward to working with you.
I attached our "Ready to Ship" supply list to this message for supplies that deliver next business day from our Facilities and Break-room Solutions Catalog and our Elle Decor Furniture overview. These are a great resource for many locations for saving time and cost for the Welcome Center and Maintenance Team.
That's all for today... Thanks again for the time and the continued business!!
Best Regards,
Paul Gomez
Inside Sales Representative | Office Depot, Inc. 9501 Amberglen Blvd., Suite 200 | Austin, TX 78729 Tel: 855.337.6811 Ext.12809 | paul.gomez1@officedepot.com
